Activity: Wake up early, review financial news and market performance to prime my mind for the week ahead. Check emails briefly for urgent matters.
Arrive at the office. Prioritize emails. Respond to urgent requests. Scan industry news for potential opportunities or threats to the fund.

Schedule individual meetings with @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3 to discuss potential statistical arbitrage strategies. Send email to @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3, @legal-1 to schedule meeting to 'Discuss Statistical Arbitrage Strategies & SEC Regulations'.

Meeting with Quantitative Research team (@qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3) to brainstorm potential statistical arbitrage strategies. Focus on strategies suitable for UHNWIs and compatible with SEC regulations. Document all ideas thoroughly.
Review the preliminary strategy ideas generated during the meeting. Evaluate their feasibility, potential returns, and associated risks. Rank them based on a preliminary risk/reward assessment.
Meet with @legal-1 to discuss SEC regulations relevant to statistical arbitrage funds. Identify potential compliance hurdles and necessary documentation requirements.
Lunch Break. Catch up on personal reading and relax.

Meet with @larch-1 and @devops-1 to discuss the infrastructure requirements for implementing the chosen strategies. Assess the capabilities of the current system and identify potential upgrades or modifications.
Email @larch-1, @devops-1, @dsde-1, @dsde-2, @sdev-1, @sdev-2 regarding infrastructure requirements for implementing the chosen strategies

Contact @dsde-1 and @dsde-2 to assess data availability and quality for the top-ranked strategies. Discuss potential data sources and collection methods. Schedule a follow up meeting for tomorrow morning.

Prepare a preliminary report summarizing the day's findings, including the potential strategies, regulatory considerations, and infrastructure requirements. Identify key questions for the executive team.
Review tomorrow's schedule and prepare for upcoming meetings. Respond to any remaining emails.
